name: arnahit.js
author: arnahit-co
description: ES6 JS Framework For Creating Cross Platform Applications [based on jquery & bootstrap]

scripts.build-web: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist dist/web && npx babel ./*.* --out-dir dist/web --copy-files && npx babel ./app --out-dir dist/web/app --copy-files && npx babel core/ --out-dir dist/web/core --copy-files &&  npx babel resources/ --out-dir dist/web/resources --copy-files && cd dist/web && npm install
scripts.build-android: echo build web application && npm run build-web && mkdir dist/android && cd dist/web && echo copying files... && cp -r * ../android
